queries:
CREATE VIEW orders AS (SELECT o.id AS id, o."date" AS date_created, o.cust_name AS customer_name, o."order-item".item AS item, o."order-item".price.txt_content_ AS amount, o."order-item".price.xml_attr_currency AS currency
FROM (SELECT unnest("root_el"."orders") AS o FROM read_json('/code/tests/functional_dtypes/advanced-json-simple/source/data/in/files/orders_*.json')));
